page.title: 02R.W. POTTER
page.content: R.W.Potter is a sand and gravel firm.They own two quarries on the other side of Ripon.They sometimes dredge the sand and gravel from the river onto their barge.Mainly they take the sand and gravel to their Northallerton plant or to their yard at Boroughbridge. They have 6 cement mixers,3 eight wheeler tippers and 3 four wheeler tippers aswell as a six wheeler unit tri axle trailer,Seddon Atkinson. At Boroughbridge they have a big garage which services any Seddon Atkinson. It is owned by Richard and Graham Potter but it still goes under the fathers name R.W.Potter.
